description: Prints out information about a surface file.

talairach_xfm_flag.title: Talairach XFM flag
talairach_xfm_flag.description: Apply talairach xfm before reporting info

rescale_flag.title: Rescale flag
rescale_flag.description: Rescale group surface to match average metrics

vertex_number.title: Vertex number
vertex_number.description: Print out vertex information for vertex vnum

extended_vertex_number.title: Extended vertex number
extended_vertex_number.description: Print out extended vertex information for vertex vnum

curvfile.title: Curvature file
curvfile.description: Check if curvature file vertices match surface vertices

annotfile.title: Annotation file
annotfile.description: Check if annotation file vertices match surface vertices; dump colortable

area_stats_flag.title: Area stats flag
area_stats_flag.description: Compute stats on triangle area (n, mean, std, min, max)

edge_stats_id.title: Edge metric ID

edge_number.description: Print out extended information about edge

vtxno.title: Vertex number for Matlab

intersections_flag.title: Intersections flag
intersections_flag.description: Print the number of vertices that belong to a face that intersects another face

mask_file.title: Mask file

label_file.title: Label file
label_file.description: Only compute edge and area stats using vertices in label

edge_file.title: Edge file
